title: Number of arrivals in tourist accommodation Latvia 2006 to 2018
summary: In general Number of arrivals in millions has rose over the Year.
Number of arrivals in millions is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest Number of arrivals in millions, of value 2.58 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Number of arrivals in millions about 2.3 was reached at Year 2016
